name: Bridge Finance Token
short_description: Bridge Finance brings equity swaps to retail crypto and stock investing, allowing you to simultaneously invest in both crypto and stock markets using the same capital or equity. Besides, we specifically target the retail stock investing market to allow for securities-based lending, something which can only be done through traditional stock brokers.
description: Bridge Finance brings equity swaps to retail crypto and stock investing, allowing you to simultaneously invest in both crypto and stock markets using the same capital or equity. Besides, we specifically target the retail stock investing market to allow for securities-based lending, something which can only be done through traditional stock brokers.
